org.grouplens.lenskit.eval.traintest

Interface TestUser

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTestUser, LenskitTestUser, MockTestUser

    public interface TestUser
    Expose recommender data to evaluate recommendations and predictions for a single user.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getUserId

        long getUserId()
        Get the ID of this user.
        Returns:
        The user's ID.

      • getTrainHistory

        UserHistory<Event> getTrainHistory()
        Return this user's training history.
        Returns:
        The history of the user from the training/query set.

      • getTestHistory

        UserHistory<Event> getTestHistory()
        Return this user's test history.
        Returns:
        The history of the user from the test set.

      • getTestRatings

        SparseVector getTestRatings()
        Get the user's test ratings. Summarizes the user's ratings from the history.
        Returns:
        The user's ratings for the test items.

      • getPredictions

        @Nullable
SparseVector getPredictions()
        Get the user's predictions.
        Returns:
        The predictions of the user's preference for items, or null if the algorithmInfo does not support rating prediction.

      • getRecommendations

        @Nullable
java.util.List<ScoredId> getRecommendations(int n,
                                                   ItemSelector candSel,
                                                   ItemSelector exclSel)
        Get the user's recommendations.
        Parameters:
        n - The number of recommendations to generate.
        candSel - The candidate selector.
        exclSel - The exclude selector.
        Returns:
        Some recommendations for the user, or null if the recommender does not support recommendation.
        See Also:
        ItemRecommender.recommend(long, int, java.util.Set, java.util.Set)

      • getRecommender

Recommender getRecommender()
        Get the recommender
        Returns:
        The recommender.
